title: Can riot hide games played stastic?
body:
So, I have been subject of abuse/harassment due to my games played (since 2013) and my current rank (silver 2)

Which I feel could be limited if hiding this statistic was available?

Would love to have some input/comments/thoughts 

Cheers!

replies.body:
Unfortunately there is no current way to hide the stat, though you could try submitting a support ticket to see if they could help you maybe reset the statistic or something. Past that I'm afraid the best advice is to simply mute as soon as someone seems like they're gonna be a dick about it. Some people will find anything to target, so I wouldn't count on just hiding the stat actually stopping that behaviour, they may just find something else to target instead.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
